description: Update the Continuous Export configuration for this export id.

destinationtype.description: The Continuous Export destination type. This has to be 'Blob'.

destinationaccountid.description: The name of destination storage account.

isenabled.description: Set to 'true' to create a Continuous Export configuration as enabled, otherwise set it to 'false'.

destinationstoragelocationid.description: The location ID of the destination storage container.

export_properties.description: Properties that need to be specified to update the Continuous Export configuration.

destinationaddress.description: The SAS URL for the destination storage container. It must grant write permission.

destinationstoragesubscriptionid.description: The subscription ID of the destination storage container.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group.

resource_name.description: The name of the Application Insights component resource.

export_id.description: The Continuous Export configuration ID. This is unique within a Application Insights component.

recordtypes.description: The document types to be exported, as comma separated values. Allowed values include 'Requests', 'Event', 'Exceptions', 'Metrics', 'PageViews', 'PageViewPerformance', 'Rdd', 'PerformanceCounters', 'Availability', 'Messages'.
